full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ZAB LAM N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI 'KHRID RIM YID CHES SUM LDAN BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @056B CES ZAB LAM NA RO'I CHOS DRUG GI SGO NAS 'KHRID PA'I RIM PA, YID CHES GSUM LDAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MI'I DBANG PO CHEN PO GRAGS PA'I RGYAL MTSAN PA'I BKAS BSKUL ZHING, CHOS KYI RJE BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN PA'I GSUNG GIS YANG YANG NAN TAN DU MDZAD DO, ,GTUM MOL SOGS PA'I GNAD RNAMS LEGS PAR THAN PA DANG, CUNG ZAD RNAM PAR DBYE DAGS PA THUN MONG PA DANG, THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I TSUL RNAMS SO SOR PHYE BA CIG GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA'I DON DU DANG, SPAL 'DI PHYOGS 'DIR 'PHRIN LAS SHIN TU CHE BAR BYUNG 'DUG NA'ANG, DE LHA DAR RGYAS CHA RGYU MI 'DUS CING, 'ON KYANG PHYOGS MOS BYED PA SHIN TU MANG BAR 'DUG PA,
